post.author: 김승엽
post.content:
Want to hear the voice of angels?

We invite you to this great moment!

Date: Saturday, December 14, 2002
        7:30 p.m.
Where: George Weston Recital Hall of Toronto Centre for the Arts
           (5040 Yonge ST)

Tickets: $20 and $22 at the Toronto Centre for the Arts box office
           or TicketMaster at 416-870-8000

The Bach Children's Chorus is one of the outstanding children's chorus in GTA and across Canada.
They have performed in front of IOC committee during the 2008 Olympic bid and Queen Elizabeth II and travelled once a year from coast to coast and internationally.
post.title: \\"Wintersong\\" Concert-The Bach Children\\'s Chorus
